data.actual_result: The check mark appear for the both colors; The old and current/new one until you reopen the color picker
data.expected_result: The check mark should appear only for the current color of the role
data.short_description: You can see 2 check marks at the same time in color picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server or go to one where you are admin/owner - Create a new role with the teal/turquoise color(Go to server settings; then to roles section; create a role and give it the teal/turquoise color; save) - Close the app (or go to another server then come back; or just close the color picker) - Open the app/go back to server/reopen the color picker - Go to server settings, then to roles - Go to the role that you made previously, and open the color picker - Select another color (without closing the color picker); Observe the  check mark for the color that the role had previously is stuck until you reopen the color picker - (see attachment for info)
